Name: Percentage of Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation out of all activity executions in the event log
Metric: Percentage of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation across all cases
Metric: Number of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' activities

Name: Percentage of variants that start with Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation
Metric: Percentage of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' out of all cases

Name: Percentage of Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation that is immediately followed by SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion
Metric: Percentage of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' out of all 'SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion'

Name: Frequency of Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation occurring before SW-Reviewer Agreed in the same case
Metric: Number of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' occurs

Name: Percentage of cases where Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation is followed by at least one reviewer-related activity (e.g., SW-Reviewer Agreed, SW-Reviewer Declined, or SW-Reviewer No Response)
Metric: Percentage of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Ratio of Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation to Manuscript Export Succeeded
Metric: Percentage of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' out of all 'Manuscript Export Succeeded'

Name: Percentage of Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation that eventually leads to SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: Percentage of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Frequency of Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation in variants that end with a final editorial decision (e.g., SW-EIC Accept, SW-EIC Reject, SW-EIC Major Revision, or SW-EIC Minor Revision)
Metric: Number of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' activities for cases where activity 'SW-EIC Accept' occurs

Name: Percentage of Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation that occurs without being preceded by any other activity in its case
Metric: Percentage of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation appearing in variants that include SW-Reviewer Agreed at least once
Metric: Number of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' occurs

Name: Percentage of Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation relative to Plagiarism Originality Report Completed
Metric: Percentage of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' out of all 'Plagiarism Originality Report Completed'

Name: Ratio of cases containing Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation that proceed to SW-AE Assign Reviewers versus those that terminate early (e.g., with Immediate Reject Decision from the Checklist or Manuscript is Withdrawn)
Metric: Percentage of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' out of all 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Percentage of Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation that is part of a variant leading to SW-Reviewer Agreed within 30 days
Metric: Percentage of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Frequency of Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation per month to identify submission trends
Metric: ERROR: computing metric {'count': activity == 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation'", 'aggregation': 'total', 'group_by': 'time:timestamp'}"
